StringProperty.Name: OutDir
StringProperty.Description: Specifies a relative path to the output file directory; can include environment variables.

StringProperty.Name: IntDir
StringProperty.Description: Specifies a relative path to the intermediate file directory; can include environment variables.

StringProperty.Name: TargetName
StringProperty.Description: Specifies a file name that this project will generate.

StringProperty.Name: TargetExt
StringProperty.Description: Specifies a file extension that this project will generate. (Example: .o, .bc, .js or .html)

StringListProperty.Name: ExtensionsToDeleteOnClean
StringListProperty.Description: Semi-colon delimited wildcard specification for which files in the intermediate directory to delete on clean or rebuild.

StringProperty.Name: BuildLogFile
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the build log file to write to when build logging is enabled.

EnumProperty.Name: ConfigurationType
EnumProperty.Description: Specifies the type of output this configuration generates.

EnumProperty.Name: CLRSupport
EnumProperty.Description: Specifies whether this configuration supports the Common Language Runtime. This is incompatible with some other settings, e.g. runtime checks. See help for /clr family of C++ compiler switches for full list of conflicts.
